abstract: The specular albedo texture this scaler evaluates.
overview:
## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerBase/specularAlbedoTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerDescriptor/specularAlbedoTextureFormat] requests.

# specularAlbedoTexture

**Instance Property**

The specular albedo texture this scaler evaluates.

## Declaration

```swift
var specularAlbedoTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerBase/specularAlbedoTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerDescriptor/specularAlbedoTextureFormat] requests.
title: specularAlbedoTexture
